mapper.select: select m.menu_name, m.menu_price from category_tb c, menu_tb m where c.category_num = m.category_num
select menu_name, menu_price from restaurant_tb r, orderList_tb o, menu_tb m where r.table_num = o.table_num and o.menu_num = m.menu_num order by rownum desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orderList_tb ( orderList_num, menu_num, table_num, order_date, id ) VALUES ( orderList_num.nextval, #{menu_num}, #{table_num}, sysdate, #{id} )
mapper.select: select o.orderList_num, o.table_num, o.menu_name, m.menu_price, o.total_price, o.total_count, o.order_date, o.id from restaurant_tb r, orderList_tb o, menu_tb m, user u where r.table_num = o.table_num and o.menu_num = m.menu_num and o.id = u.id
